name: Twice-Baked Potatoes for the Freezer
author: SHORECOOK
summary: One would think you spent all day in the kitchen when you serve these potatoes as a side dish. Feel free to season the potato filling to your liking.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Place potatoes on the center rack and bake until they are soft in the center, about 1 hour
Remove from the oven and cool to the touch, about 15 minutes
Cut potatoes in half and remove potato flesh from the skin, leaving the skin intact
Place potato flesh in a large bowl and beat until fluffy using an electric mixer
Add butter, milk, salt, and pepper and beat until smooth
Spoon potato mixture into a pastry bag fitted with a large tip and pipe back into the potato skins
Transfer to freezer bags and freeze until ready to use
